com.lavanya.api.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.api.controller.UserController

  • @RestController
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller to control all the requests related to User object.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public java.lang.String login(@RequestBody
                                                            AuthBodyDto data)
        POST requests for /login endpoint. This controller-method send data required for user authentication.
        Parameters:
        data - is the bean where the password and username of the user are stored to authenticate the user.
        Returns:
        token generated during the login step.

      • getUserConnected

        @GetMapping(value="/user")
public UserDto getUserConnected()
        GET requests for /user endpoint. method to retrieve a particular user identified by its username.
        Returns:
        UserDto object.

      • getUser

        @GetMapping(value="/user/{id}")
public UserDto getUser(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                        java.util.UUID userId)
        GET requests for /user/{id} endpoint. method to retrieve a particular user identified by its uuid.
        Parameters:
        userId - as the uuid of the user to retrieve from database.
        Returns:
        UserDto object.

      • saveUser

        @PostMapping(value="/saveUser")
public void saveUser(@RequestBody
                                                      UserToRegister userToRegister)
        POST requests for /saveUser endpoint. This controller-method saves an user and encode its password in database.
        Parameters:
        userToRegister - for the user to save in DB.

      • updateUser

        @PostMapping(value="/updateUser")
public void updateUser(@RequestBody
                                                          UserDto userDto)
        POST requests for /updateUser endpoint. This controller-method updates an user already saved in database.
        Parameters:
        userDto - that needs to be updated.

      • showUsersListByPage

        @GetMapping(value="/users/{pageNumber}")
public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User> showUsersListByPage(@PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                                                int currentPage)
        GET requests for /users/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all users registered in database.
        Parameters:
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Users to be displayed.
        Returns:
        usersList page of all users registered

      • showUsersList

        @GetMapping(value="/users")
public java.util.List<UserDto> showUsersList()
        GET requests for /users endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all users registered in database.
        Returns:
        List of all users registered.

      • validateOrNotUserProfile

        @PostMapping(value="/validate/profile")
public void validateOrNotUserProfile(@RequestBody
                                                                              UserDto userDto)
        POST requests for /validate/profile endpoint. This controller-method validates or not a user profile.
        Parameters:
        userDto - for who the profile needs to be validated by admin.

      • getUserSearchPage

        @GetMapping(value="/search/users/{pageNumber}")
public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserDto> getUserSearchPage(@PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                                                        int currentPage,
                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="keyword",required=false)
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String keyword)
        GET requests for /search/users/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves all users using criteria.
        Parameters:
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Users to be displayed.
        keyword - a String attribute used to filter a search users by keyword.
        Returns:
        page of list of UserDtos.
